# maximumNumberOfTouches

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of fingers that can touch the view for gesture recognition.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumNumberOfTouches: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSUIntegerMax].

## Configuring the gesture recognizer

- **minimumNumberOfTouches**: The minimum number of fingers that can touch the view for gesture recognition.
